member.name: P:RandomStackGenerator.My.Resources.Resources.TestUnitsTable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to UNIT_ID UNIT_CAT LEVEL SUBRACE BRANCH SIZE_SMALL ATTACK_ID XP_KILLED XP_NEXT LEADERSHIP WATER_ONLY REACH g000uu0001 0 1 1 0 True g000aa0001 20 80 0 False 3 g000uu0002 0 2 1 0 True g000aa0002 60 475 0 False 3 g000uu0003 0 3 1 0 True g000aa0003 120 950 0 False 3 g000uu0004 0 2 1 0 True g000aa0004 60 475 0 False 3 g000uu0005 0 3 1 0 True g000aa0005 115 950 0 False 3 g000uu0006 0 1 1 1 True g000aa0006 20 70 0 False 2 g000uu0007 0 2 1 1 True g000aa0007 60 500 0 False 2 g000uu0008 0 1 1 2 True g000aa0008 [rest of string was truncated]";.
